    Introduction

    Welcome to TRAKA API! You can use this API to access our endpoints, which allows you to create and manage maintenance requests.

    You can connect to our API by making an HTTP request in any language of choice, and you get a JSON response.

    Requests & Responses

    Requests

    All routes in this api uses four HTTP VERBS

    • GET
    • POST
    • PUT
    • DELETE

    Your can send data with any of these to any of our routes, data sent depends on the route you are pointing to. Data sent can be in three ways

    • BODY (Form Data mostly sent with POST or PUT)
    • QUERY STRING e.g. api/v1/users?name=Ben, value is Ben, key is name
    • PARAMS e.g. route api/v1/users/:id will be accessed as api/v1/users/1 value 1 is replacing id

    Through out this doc we will always state the form of sending any data either it be as body or query string or parameter

    Responses

    We follow the Jsend Response Format for our response. Response from our API will always consist of

    • STATUS
    • BODY

    Our API uses the following status codes:

    Status Code Meaning
    200 Request OK -- Your request is valid and processes were successfull.
    201 Created -- Returned when new resource is created
    400 Bad Request -- The syntax of the request is wrong
    404 Not Found -- The specified resource could not be found.
    409 Conflict -- The specified resource already exist
    422 Unprocessable Entity -- Returned for validation errors

    Response Body

    Success response: 2XX status range

    
{
  status: "success",
  data: {
    user: {
      id: 1,
      name: "John David",
      phone: "08164488989",
      email: "daveholuborhee@gmail.com"
    }
  }
}

    Fail response: 4XX status range

    
{
  status: "fail",
  data: {
    email: "Email should be unique"
  }
}

    Error response: 5XX status range

    
{
  status: "error",
  message: "An internal server error occured"
}

    The response body is always in json format, it has three keys

    • status This should not be confused with the status code on data
    • data
    • message

    Only two of this will be returned at any point, it's either "status and data" or "status and message".

    NOTE: data will sometimes be null, even when status is "success", e.g. getting all requests made by a user, and the user has no request yet.

    Authentication

    There are two routes for authentication

    • Login
    • SignUp

    Signup

    201 Success response:

    
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
      "user": {
          "id": 21,
          "firstName": "John",
          "lastName": "David",
          "phone": "+234356556565",
          "email": "daveh_oluborhee@gmail.com",
          "address": "6, dsdsfsf, yaba",
          "createdAt": "2018-05-31T16:54:45.811Z",
          "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T16:54:45.811Z"
      }
  }
}

    400 Failure Response for missing required variable example for email and phone:

    {
  status: "fail",
  data: {
    phone: ["The phone field is required."],
    email: ["Email is required"],
  }
}

    HTTP Request

    POST https://weconnect-ng.herokuapp.com/api/v1/signup

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    firstName body null true This is the name of the user to be registered
    lastName body null true This is the name of the user to be registered
    phone body null true Contact Phone number for user.
    email body null true Contact Email Address for user.
    password body null true The Password for subsequent authentication.
    address body null true Address user lives at

    Log in

    200 Success response:

    
{
  "status": "success",
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6MjEsImlhdCI6MTUyNzc4OTcwMSwiZXhwIjoxNTI3NzkzMzAxfQ.6gAhNUcW5Vhce-wBdYowywS-iQiScyAIpek3MFhOEE4",
  "data": {
      "user": {
          "table": "users",
          "id": 21,
          "firstName": "John",
          "lastName": "David",
          "phone": "+234356556565",
          "email": "daveh_oluborhee@gmail.com",
          "address": "6, dsdsfsf, yaba",
          "createdAt": "2018-05-31T16:54:45.811Z",
          "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T16:54:45.811Z"
      }
  }
}

    401 Failure Response for missing wrong email and phone

    {
  status: "fail",
  message: "Email and password doesn't match"
}

    400 Failure Response for short password

    {
  status: "fail",
  data: {
    password: ["The password must be at least 6 characters."], 
  }
}

    HTTP Request

    POST https://weconnect-ng.herokuapp.com/api/v1/signup

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    email body null true Contact Email Address for user.
    password body null true The Password for subsequent authentication.

    Request Resource

    • GET ALL REQUESTS
    • GET A REQUEST'S DETAIL
    • CREATE A REQUEST
    • MODIFY A REQUEST'S DETAIL
    • APPROVE A REQUEST
    • DISAPPROVE A REQUEST
    • RESOLVE A REQUEST

    200 Success Response when No request is found

    {
  status: "success",
  data: {
    requests: []
  }
}

    HTTP Request

    • GET https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/users/requests
    • GET https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/requests Admin Authorization required

    Request Data

    None

    Get a request's Detail

    200 Success response

    {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "request": {
            "table": "requests",
            "id": 15,
            "title": "Another Title",
            "description": "Good description",
            "requestedOn": "2018-05-30T13:09:25.621Z",
            "currentStatus": "UNRESOLVED",
            "maxHour": "24",
            "userId": 16,
            "address": "Another aAdres",
            "createdAt": "2018-05-30T13:09:25.621Z",
            "updatedAt": "2018-05-30T13:09:25.621Z"
        }
    }
}

    404 Error response when Id is not found

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "This request does not exist: Error: Resource not found on server"
}

    HTTP Request

    GET https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/users/requests/:requestId

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    requestId parameter null true Id of request to get

    Create a Request

    201 Success Response

    {
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "request": {
            "table": "requests",
            "id": 16,
            "title": "Laptop issue",
            "description": "My new Laptop has issue, My new Laptop has issue",
            "requestedOn": "2018-05-31T19:46:09.272Z",
            "currentStatus": "UNRESOLVED",
            "maxHour": "24",
            "userId": 1,
            "address": "3, 4567",
            "createdAt": "2018-05-31T19:46:09.272Z",
            "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T19:46:09.272Z"
        }
    }
}

    400 Error Response for missing required title

    {
    "status": "fail",
    "data": {
      "title": [
          "The title field is required."
      ]
    }
}

    400 Error Response for short description

    {
    "status": "fail",
    "data": {
      "description": [
          "The description must be at least 30 characters."
      ]
    }
}

    HTTP Request

    POST https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/users/requests

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    title body null true Descriptive title for request
    description body null true Description of the request
    address body user's address false Address where maintenance is required
    maxHour body 168 false Maximum hour required for request to be solved

    Modify a request's detail

    200 Success Response

    {
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "request": {
        "table": "requests",
        "id": 17,
        "title": "Laptop issue",
        "description": "A better description, for the request that meets the standard",
        "requestedOn": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "currentStatus": "UNRESOLVED",
        "maxHour": "24",
        "userId": 1,
        "address": "3, 4567",
        "createdAt": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T19:54:42.430Z"
    }
  }
}

    404 Error response when requestId is not found

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "This request does not exist Error: Resource not found on server"
}

    400 Error response when request has either been approved, disapproved or resolved

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "Modification is not allowed on an approved, rejected, or resolved request"
}

    HTTP Request

    PUT https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/users/requests/:requestId

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    requestId parameter null true Id of request to modify
    title body null false Title of Request
    description body null false Description of Request
    maxHour body null false Maximum Hour to resolve request
    address body null false Address for maintenance

    Resolve a request

    200 Success Response

    {
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "request": {
        "table": "requests",
        "id": 17,
        "title": "Laptop issue",
        "description": "A better description, for the request that meets the standard",
        "requestedOn": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "currentStatus": "RESOLVED",
        "maxHour": "24",
        "userId": 1,
        "address": "3, 4567",
        "createdAt": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T19:54:42.430Z"
    }
  }
}

    404 Error response when requestId is not found

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "This request does not exist Error: Resource not found on server"
}

    400 Error response when request is not approved

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "You cannot resolve this request, request is not approved"
}

    HTTP Request

    PUT https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/requests/:requestId/resolve

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    requestId parameter null true Id of request to modify

    Approve a request

    200 Success Response

    {
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "request": {
        "table": "requests",
        "id": 17,
        "title": "Laptop issue",
        "description": "A better description, for the request that meets the standard",
        "requestedOn": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "currentStatus": "APPROVED",
        "maxHour": "24",
        "userId": 1,
        "address": "3, 4567",
        "createdAt": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T19:54:42.430Z"
    }
  }
}

    404 Error response when requestId is not found

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "This request does not exist Error: Resource not found on server"
}

    400 Error response when request is already resolved

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "You cannot approve this request, request is already resolved"
}

    HTTP Request

    PUT https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/requests/:requestId/approve

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    requestId parameter null true Id of request to modify

    Disapprove a request

    200 Success Response

    {
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "request": {
        "table": "requests",
        "id": 17,
        "title": "Laptop issue",
        "description": "A better description, for the request that meets the standard",
        "requestedOn": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "currentStatus": "APPROVED",
        "maxHour": "24",
        "userId": 1,
        "address": "3, 4567",
        "createdAt": "2018-05-31T19:50:28.308Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-05-31T19:54:42.430Z"
    }
  }
}

    404 Error response when requestId is not found

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "This request does not exist Error: Resource not found on server"
}

    400 Error response when request is already resolved

    {
    "status": "error",
    "message": "You cannot disapprove this request, request is already resolved"
}

    HTTP Request

    PUT https://traka.herokuapp.com/api/v1/requests/:requestId/disapprove

    Request Data

    Key Type Default Required Description
    requestId parameter null true Id of request to modify
    json
